homepage.title: Hi! I'm David,
homepage.subtitle: and I'm creating creating better web experiences.
homepage.introduction: Hello, my name is David Costa. I'm a Senior Software Engineer living in Brazil, creating solutions to help support our customers.
homepage.experiences: I work with Javascript and Typescript, using React as the main framework most of the time.
homepage.goal: This website is intended to concentrate my articles, projects, and be a hub for my networks.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Welcome to my blog, where I write about my journey as a developer, and share some tips and tricks I've learned along the way.
